workflow.name: AssignUserGroups
workflow.description: Assign Users to Groups

section.heading: Select User Group
section.paragraph: Select the group that you would like to edit from the list below.

section.heading: Group: #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number})
section.paragraph: To return to the Assign User Groups Menu, select Assign User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To add a user, select Add User from the navigation bar above. To search for a user within the group, select Search Within Group from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Users In Group
section.paragraph: To remove a user from the group, select a user from the list below.

section.heading: User Search
section.paragraph: To search for a user, enter the name and login information below and select Search. Leave all fields blank to return a search containing all users. Maximum number of search results is 101 users.

section.heading: Available Users
section.paragraph: Select a user to add to group #{Groups.name}.

section.heading: Add User To Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To add #{Users.reference_name} to the group, select Add User below.
section.heading: Add #{Users.reference_name} to #{Groups.name}?
Remove User From Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To remove #{Users.reference_name} from the group, select Remove User below.
section.heading: Remove #{Users.reference_name} from #{Groups.name}?
Search Within Group
section.paragraph: To search for a user in the group, enter the name and login information below and select Search. Leave all fields blank to return a search containing all users. Maximum number of search results is 101 users.

section.heading: Search Group #{Groups.name} Results
section.paragraph: The users currently in the group matching the criteria entered are listed below. To remove a user, select the user from the list below. To return to the Assign User Groups Menu, select Assign User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To add a user, select Add User from the navigation bar above. To search for a user within the group, select Search Within Group from the navigation bar above.

workflow.name: DeliveryTracking
workflow.description: Track the Delivery of messages

section.paragraph: Select a message delivery type to display from the list below, or All to show all. Click Search by Date to display Message Deliveries for a specific day. Click on a Message Delivery to show details.
date and time created| recipient name : | alert type | status | in processing_time ms
Enter From Date and To Date to narrow search. The default is the last 24 hours. Optionally, add a Phone Number to display.
Listed are the delivered messages over the last hour. Click Search by Date to display Message Deliveries for a specific day. Click on a Message Delivery to show details.
| . . . date / ..time. . . |phone|alertID| alert type | status
Listed are the most recent 101 messages and alerts.

Enter all or part of the recipient's name or number.

workflow.name: Help

section.paragraph:
By default, the timestamp provided in the search box includes a time zone reference (i.e. -0500). This reference is not necessary and can be ignored or removed.
Valid Date/Time Stamp Examples: 2014-07-04 2014-07-04 12:00 2014-07-04 12:00:45

section.paragraph: Select the Configuration below to mange elements of that Configuration. If the Configuration is not listed below, select Create Configuration above in the navigation bar.

workflow.name: ManageDevices
workflow.description: Manage Devices Engage is aware of

section.heading: Search For Phone
section.paragraph: To search for a specific phone, enter search criteria below. If you do not have the phone number for the phone you are looking for, you can also search using the device's name, user's first name, last name or login information. To search by phone number, the phone must be online. All search fields are optional.

Listed below are phones that are online. Select a phone to view its details. If you do not see the desired phone in the list below, use the search above to specify more specific criteria.
| Phone | S t a t u s | I P address | Phone Type | Device Name | Unit | User Name |

section.heading: Search For Phones
section.paragraph: To search for a specific phone, enter search criteria below. If you do not have the phone number for the phone you are looking for, you can also search using the device's name, user's first name, last name or login information. To search by phone number, the phone must be online. All search fields are optional.

To assign another user to the phone, select Assign a User to #{Devices.lines.number} below.

workflow.name: ManageFacility
workflow.description: Workflow to create and manage Beds, Rooms, Units, Facilities and Locations

section.heading: Select a Facility
section.paragraph: Select the Facility below to create the Units, Rooms and Beds in that Facility. If the Facility is not listed below, select Create Facility above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Create New Unit
section.paragraph: To create a new Unit, enter its name below and select the Create button. Units are used to associate Users, Phones, and Message Templates. To select an already created Unit, select it from the list below. To edit #{Facilities.name}, select Edit Facility above in the navigation bar.
Units in #{Facilities.name}

section.heading: Create New Room
section.paragraph: To create a new room in #{Units.name}, enter the room number and optional room name below and select the Create button. To modify an existing room in #{Units.name}, select it from the list below.
Rooms in #{Units.name}

section.heading: Create New Bed
section.paragraph: To create a new bed in Room #{Rooms.room_number}, enter a bed number below and select the Create button. A paired location will also be created. Enter a dial back number for the bed which will be used when a nurse calls back to the bed when they receive an alert. Listed at the bottom of the page are beds that already exists for the Room. Do not try to create a bed that already exists. To remove a bed from #{Rooms.room_number}, select it from the list below.
Beds in #{Rooms.room_number}.

section.heading: Create New Facility
section.paragraph: To create a new Facility, enter the name below and select the Create button.

section.heading: Edit Facility
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Facility's name. To make changes, select the edit field and make the necessary changes and then select the Update button. To remove the Facility, select Remove Facility above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Edit Unit
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Unit's name. To make changes, select the edit field and make the necessary changes and then select the Update button. To remove the Unit, select Remove Unit above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Edit Bed
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Bed Number and the Dial Back Number. To edit those, enter the correct information into the correct field and then select the Update button.

section.heading: Remove Facility
section.paragraph: A Facility can only be removed if there are not any Units, Rooms or Locations assigned to it. If there are not any Units, Rooms or Locations listed below, you may remove #{Facilities.name} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Units, Rooms or Locations listed below, you will first need to remove them then remove the Facility.
Listed below are the Units in the Facility. _____________________________________________
Listed below are the Rooms assigned to the Facility. _____________________________________________
Listed below are the Locations assigned to the Facility. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Unit
section.paragraph: A Unit can only be removed if there are not any Rooms assigned to it. If there are not any Rooms listed below, you may remove #{Units.name} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Rooms listed below, select the room and you will be taken to Create New Bed. At the top of Create New Bed you will have the option to remove the room.
Listed below are the Rooms assigned to the Unit. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Room
section.paragraph: A Room can only be removed if there are not any Beds assigned to it. If there are not any Beds listed below, you may remove #{Rooms.room_number} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Beds listed below, you will first need to remove them. Select the bed from the list below and you will be taken to Edit Bed where you will have the option to remove the Bed.
Listed below are the Beds assigned to the Room. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Remove Bed
section.paragraph: Listed below are Locations that the Bed is assigned to, you will be able to remove the Bed but be aware the Locations will still exist and may need to be updated or may not have any beds associated to them.
Listed below are the Locations assigned to the Bed. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Search Room
section.paragraph: To search for room, enter the room number and optional room name below and select the Search button.

section.heading: Select Room
section.paragraph: Below is a list of rooms that meet your search criteria.

section.heading: Remove Room
section.paragraph: A Room can only be removed if there are not any Beds assigned to it. If there are not any Beds listed below, you may remove #{Rooms.room_number} by selecting the Delete button. If there are Beds listed below, you will first need to remove them. Select the bed from the list below and you will be taken to Edit Bed where you will have the option to remove the Bed.
Listed below are the Beds assigned to the Room. _____________________________________________

section.heading: Edit Bed
section.paragraph: Displayed below is the Bed Number and the Dial Back Number. To edit those, enter the correct information into the correct field and then select the Update button.

section.heading: Remove Bed
section.paragraph: Listed below are Locations that the Bed is assigned to, you will be able to remove the Bed but be aware the Locations will still exist and may need to be updated or may not have any beds associated to them.
Listed below are the Locations assigned to the Bed. _____________________________________________

workflow.name: ManageFunctionalRoles
workflow.description: A workflow to manage functional roles for the facility.

section.heading: Select Facility
section.paragraph: Select the facility for which to manage Functional Roles.

section.heading: Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the active Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Functional Role below to edit or remove that role. To view a list of inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}, select View Inactive Functional Roles below. To create a new Functional Role, select Create New Functional Role from the navigation bar above.
Single-Bed Functional Roles ________________________________________

section.heading: Inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the inactive Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Functional Role below to edit or remove that role. To go back to the list of active Functional Roles, select Functional Roles for #{Facilities.name} in the navigational bar above.
Single-Bed Functional Roles ________________________________________

section.heading: Create New Functional Role
section.paragraph: To create a new Functional Role choose single bed or multi bed role. A single bed role is for a location that represents one bed. A multi-bed role is for a location which may represent more than one bed as in the case of a hospital unit. This allows a caregiver such as a charge nurse to be assigned to a group of beds instead of each individual bed.

section.heading: Create New Functional Role
section.paragraph: Enter the new Functional Role information below and select "Create". New Functional Roles are always active by default.

section.heading: Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})

url-link.label: Change the active/inactive state for this role
Change the location type for this role

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select the link below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to inactive" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Active/Inactive State For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to active" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another active state, select the link below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

list.value: Change #{name} (#{abbreviation}) from single to multi bed.
Change #{name} (#{abbreviation}) from multi to single bed.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another location type, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to single bed" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Change Location Type For #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})
section.paragraph: To change this Functional Role to another location type, select "Change #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) to multi-bed" below. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

section.heading: Remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})?
section.paragraph: Select the link below to remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}) if it has no assignments. If the Functional Role has been used on any assignment, it may not be removed from the system. As an alternative, the Functional Role may be moved to an inactive state on the "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" page. To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

list.value: The Functional Role #{name} (#{abbreviation}) has #{assignments.count} assignments and cannot be removed.
The Functional Role #{name} (#{abbreviation}) has no assignments and may be removed.

section.heading: Remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})?
section.paragraph: Select the button below to remove #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation}). To go back to the edit page for this Functional Role, select "Edit #{FunctionalRoles.name} (#{FunctionalRoles.abbreviation})" above.

workflow.name: ManageLocations
workflow.description: Workflow to manage Locations

section.paragraph: Locations are used in staff assignment. Locations can represent a single bed, an entire unit, or any set of beds.
section.heading: Search Locations
section.paragraph:
To search for a location, enter your search criteria below. Leave all fields blank to search for all locations. Maximum number of search results is 101 locations.
Listed below are locations without any beds assigned. To assign a bed to the location, select the location from the list.

Name | Unit | Facility

section.heading: Location Search Results
section.paragraph:
Search results are listed below. The search results display the location's Name, Unit, and Facility.
To view additional locations, return to the menu and search again.
Name | Unit | Facility | Location ID | Facility ID

section.heading: Edit Location
section.paragraph:
Displayed below are the location's Facility, Unit, and Name along with beds that are currently assigned to the location and the required roles for the location. Select the link for the Unit to view the Locations for the Unit.
To change the location's Name, edit the value in the box below and then click Update. To remove a bed or required role from the location, select the bed or role from the list.
To assign a bed to the location, select Assign Bed above in the navigation bar. To assign the location to a unit, select Assign Unit above in the navigation bar. To assign a required role to the location, select Assign Role above in the navigation bar. To remove the location, select Remove Location above in the navigation bar.

Listed below are beds that are currently assigned to the location.
Unit | Room | Bed
Listed below are the roles that are currently required by the location.
To Delete Assignments (If needed):

To search for a bed to add to the location, enter the Unit, Room Number, or Bed.
Listed below are the beds currently assigned to the location.

Choose the Bed that you want to assign to the location.

section.paragraph: From the list below, select the facility for the new location.

workflow.name: ManageMonitorAssignments
workflow.description: Workflow to create and edit Monitor Techs and assign beds to the Monitor Tech

section.heading: Monitor Tech Assignments Menu
section.paragraph: Select the Monitor Tech below to begin assigning beds to them.

section.heading: Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number} Bed Assignments
section.paragraph: Listed below are the beds that are assigned to Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number}. To remove Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number} from the bed select the bed below. To assign a bed given a list of beds by unit select Search Rooms by Unit above in the navigation bar. To assign a bed given a room number select Search by Room Number above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Search Rooms by Unit
section.paragraph: Select a unit below to get a list of all the rooms in that unit. To search for a specific room select Search By Room Number above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Select Room from #{Units.name}
section.paragraph: The list below displays the rooms,beds in that room and the Monitor Tech assigned to that bed if one is assigned. Select the room below that contains the bed that you want to assign the Monitor Tech to. If you do not see the room you are looking for you can either select Search Room by Unit and select a different unit or select Search By Room above in the navigation bar to search for a specific room number.

section.heading: Select Bed to Assign
section.paragraph: The list below displays the beds that are in room #{Rooms.room_number} and the Monitor Tech if one is assigned to the bed. Select the bed that you wish to assign the Monitor Tech to.

section.heading: Monitor Tech Assignment
section.paragraph: Assign Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number} to room #{Beds.room.room_number} bed #{Beds.bed_number}?

section.heading: Search By Room Number
section.paragraph: Enter the room number that you want to assign a Monitor Tech to below. To search by unit select Search Rooms by Unit above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Select Room
section.paragraph: The list below displays the rooms, beds in that room, if assigned the monitor tech. Select the room below to assign it to the Monitor Tech.

section.heading: Select Bed to Assign
section.paragraph: The list below displays the beds that are in room #{Rooms.room_number} and the Monitor Tech if one is assigned to the bed. Select the bed that you wish to assign the Monitor Tech to.

section.heading: Monitor Tech Assignment
section.paragraph: Assign Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number} to room #{Beds.room.room_number} bed #{Beds.bed_number}?

section.heading: Remove Monitor Tech from Bed
section.paragraph: Really remove Monitor Tech #{MonitorTech.tech_number} from room #{Beds.room.room_number} bed #{Beds.bed_number}?

section.heading: Favorites List
section.paragraph: The list below displays all templates that are currently selected as your favorites. To remove a template from your favorites list, select it below. To add a template to your favorites list, select Add a Favorite from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Template
section.paragraph:
Below are lists of all templates available in the system. Select the template from the appropriate list to add it as a favorite.
Templates that do not require a room number:
Templates that require a room number:

section.paragraph: To add the template "#{Templates.name}" as a favorite, select Add Favorite below. To cancel adding the template, select Manage My Template Favorites or Template List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Remove as Favorite Confirmation
section.paragraph: To remove the template "#{Templates.name}" from your favorites list, select the Remove button below. To cancel removing the template, select Manage My Template Favorites from the navigation bar above.

workflow.name: ManagePresenceStates
workflow.description: A workflow to manage the various presence states

section.heading: Select Facility
section.paragraph: Select the facility for which you wish to manage Presence States.

section.heading: Presence States for #{Facilities.name}
section.paragraph:
Below are the Presence States for #{Facilities.name}. Select a Presence State below to edit or remove it. You can also use the link above to create a new Presence State for this Facility.
Available Presence States ________________________________________

section.heading: Create New Presence State
section.paragraph: Select one of the links below to indicate whether the new Presence State is "Available" or "Unavailable".

section.heading: Remove #{PresenceStates.status}: #{PresenceStates.show}?
section.paragraph: Click the button to below to remove #{PresenceStates.status} #{PresenceStates.show}.

section.heading: Create New Available Presence State
section.paragraph: Enter the Status of the Presence state, the text that should display with the Presence State.

section.heading: Edit #{PresenceStates.status} (#{PresenceStates.show})
section.paragraph: To change this Presence State to unavailable, select the "Change to Unavailable" link below. To change the status of this Presence State, enter the new status and click "Update". To remove this Presence State from the facility, choose "Remove Presence State" above.

section.heading: Create New Unavailable Presence State
section.paragraph: Enter the Status of the Presence state, the text that should display with the Presence State.

section.heading: Edit #{PresenceStates.status} (#{PresenceStates.show})
section.paragraph: To change this Presence State to available, select the "Change to Available" link below. To change the status of this Presence State, enter the new status and click "Update". To remove this Presence State from the facility, choose "Remove Presence State" above.

workflow.name: ManageSites

section.paragraph: To remove a facility from the site, select a facility from the list. To add a facility to the site, select Add Facility below.
Select a department to view the department details and manage the department's units, select Add to add a department.

section.heading: Remove Site
section.paragraph:
Select below to remove site #{Sites.name}. If this site has any facilities or departments, the site removal will fail. Remove all facilities and departments from this site before attempting to remove it.
This site has #{Sites.site_facilities.count} facilities. (Must be 0 to remove successfully) This site has #{Sites.departments.count} departments. (Must be 0 to remove successfully)

section.heading: Department Details
section.paragraph: Below are the units assigned to #{Departments.name}. To remove a unit from the department, select the unit from the list. To add a unit to the department, select Add Unit below. To remove the department, select Remove Department above in the navigation bar.

section.heading: Add Department

section.heading: Remove Department
section.paragraph: Are you sure you want to remove department #{Departments.name} from site #{Sites.name}?

workflow.name: ManageTemplates

section.heading: Manage Message Template Categories

section.heading: Manage #{TemplateCategories.name} Category
section.paragraph: To return to the main menu or remove the category, select the Manage Template Categories Menu or the Remove #{TemplateCategories.name} Category link above. To remove a template from the category, select a template from the list below. To add a new or existing template to the category, select a link below.
Select a Template to remove it from Category #{TemplateCategories.name}.
Select the link below to add a new template to the category.
Select the link below to add an existing template to the category.
section.heading: Unit Association for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}
section.paragraph: The following units are associated with Category #{TemplateCategories.name}. To remove a unit association from the category, select a unit from the list below.

section.heading: Create Template Category
section.paragraph: Create a new Message Template Category.

section.heading: New Message Template for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}
section.paragraph: The Template Name field will display in the user's template list for Category #{TemplateCategories.name}. The Message field contains the body of the message and must be 32 letters or less.

section.heading: Add Existing Message Template
section.paragraph: Select a Message Template from the list below to add to the #{TemplateCategories.name} category.

section.heading: Confirm Template To Be Added
section.paragraph: Add the Message Template "#{Templates.name}" to the #{TemplateCategories.name} category?

section.heading: Confirm Template To Be Removed
section.paragraph: Remove the Message Template "#{Templates.name}" from the #{TemplateCategories.name} category? This will not delete the Message Template from other Categories.

section.heading: Confirm Category To Be Removed
section.paragraph: Remove the "#{TemplateCategories.name}" Category? This will not delete any Message Templates.

section.heading: Message Templates
section.paragraph:
To add a message template, click on the New Message Template in the navigation bar above. Select a message template below to edit the text.
Templates that do not require a room number:
Templates that require a room number:

section.heading: Update Message Template
section.paragraph: The Template Name field will display in the user's message list. The Message field contains the body of the message and must be 32 letters or less.
This template is in the following Template Categories:

section.heading: New Message Template
section.paragraph: The Template Name field will display in the user's template list. The Message field contains the body of the message and must be 32 letters or less.

section.heading: Remove #{Templates.name}?
section.paragraph: Removing #{Templates.name} from the list of templates will also remove the template from all categories.

section.heading: Units To Add To Category #{TemplateCategories.name}
section.paragraph: The following units can be associated with Category #{TemplateCategories.name}. Select a unit from the list below to associate it with the category.

workflow.name: ManageUserGroups
workflow.description: Manage Groups of Users

section.heading: Select User Group
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage Alert Group Assignments Menu, select Manage Alert Group Assignments Menu from the navigation bar above. To create a new group, select Create New Group from the navigation bar above. To manage a group, select a group from the list below.

section.heading: Group: #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number})
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To add a user, select Add User to Group from the navigation bar above. To edit the group name or number, select Edit Group from the navigation bar above. To remove a group, select Remove Group from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Users in Group
section.paragraph: To remove a user from the group, select a user from the list below. To search for a user within the group, select the Search Within Group #{Groups.name} link below.
section.heading: Unit Association for Group
section.paragraph: The units below are associated with Group #{Groups.name}. To disassociate a unit from the group, select a unit from the list below. To associate a unit, select Add Unit Association to Group #{Groups.name} link below

section.heading: Create New Group
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To create a new group, enter the name and number for the group in the fields below and select Create.

section.heading: Edit Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To return to Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu in the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users In Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To edit the group name and/or number, edit the fields below and select Update.

section.heading: User Search
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users In Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To search for a user enter the First Name, Last Name, and/or Login information below. Select the Search button with no criteria to return a search containing all users. Maximum number of search results is 101 users.

section.heading: Available Users
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users In Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To add a user to the group, select a user from the list below. To search for a user, select User Search from the link below.

section.heading: Add User To Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To return to Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users In Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To add #{Users.reference_name} to the group, select Add User below.
section.heading: Add #{Users.reference_name} to Group #{Groups.name}?
Remove User From Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To return to Manage User Groups Menu, click Manage User Groups Menu in the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, click Users In Group #{Groups.name} in the navigation bar above. To remove the user from the group, select Remove User below.
section.heading: Remove #{Users.reference_name} from Group #{Groups.name}?
Remove Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To return to Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users in Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To remove the group, select Remove Group below.
section.heading: Remove Group #{Groups.name}?
Search Within Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: To return to Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users In Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To search for a user in Group #{Groups.name}, enter the First Name, Last Name, and/or Login information of the user below. Select the Search button with no criteria to return a search containing all users. Maximum number of search results is 101 users.

section.heading: Search Group #{Groups.name} Results
section.paragraph: To return to the Manage User Groups Menu, select Manage User Groups Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to the list of users in the group, select Users in Group #{Groups.name} from the navigation bar above. To remove a user from Group #{Groups.name}, select a user from the list below. To search for a user within the group, select the Search Within Group #{Groups.name} link below.

section.heading: Units To Add To Group #{Groups.name}
section.paragraph: The following units can be associated with Group #{Groups.name}. Select a unit from the list below to associate it with the group.

section.heading: Search Users
section.paragraph: To search for a user enter all or part of the user's first and last name then select Search. Both fields are optional. To display a list of all users, leave both fields blank and select Search. A maximum of 101 users will be displayed.

The user's group, title and default unit for the user (if they have been set) are listed below. To add the user to another group, select Add Group from the navigation bar above. To remove the user from their current unit select Remove User From Unit from the navigation bar above.

section.paragraph: To assign the user to the group, select the Assign button. To cancel with no changes, select Manage User's Group/Title/Default Unit Menu from the navigation bar above.

Remove User From Group
section.paragraph: To remove the user from the group, select the Remove button. To cancel with no changes, select Manage User's Group/Title/Default Unit Menu or User Menu from the navigation bar above.

workflow.name: SendMassNotification
workflow.description: Send and Cancel a Mass Notification to a group.

section.heading: Mass Notifications
section.paragraph: Mass Notifications are used to notify large groups of users of high, medium, or low priority events. You may create, update, or cancel mass notifications using the following links.
Send a high priority Mass Notification.
Send a medium priority Mass Notification.
Send a low priority Mass Notification.
Update or Cancel a Mass Notification.

section.heading: Search All Groups
section.paragraph: To search for a group, enter all or part of the group's name. To search for a group number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available groups, leave both fields blank. To return to the Send Mass Notification menu, select Send Mass Notification Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Group
section.paragraph: Select a user group from the list below to notify the group. To return to the Send Mass Notification menu, select Send Mass Notification Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a group you would like to send a mass notification to, select Search Mass Notifications and modify the criteria of the search.

section.heading: Send Mass Notification
section.paragraph: Enter the information for your notification to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number}). Use the edit fields to enter the required information. The time-to-live is used in XMPP environments to determine how long the notification stays active. To return to the Send Mass Notification menu, select Send Mass Notification Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a notification to a different group, select Search All Groups from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Notification Confirmation
Search for Mass Notifications to Update or Cancel
section.paragraph: You may search mass notifications that have not been cancelled in the last 24 hours. To search for mass notifications by subject, enter the subject below. To search for mass notifications sent to a group, enter the name and/or number of the group below. All search fields are optional. To return to the Send Mass Notification menu, select Send Mass Notification Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Mass Notification
section.paragraph:
Listed are the most recent 101 notifications matching the search criteria provided. If you do not see a mass notification you would like to update or cancel, select Search Mass Notifications and modify the criteria of the search. To return to the Send Mass Notification menu, select Send Mass Notification Menu from the navigation bar above.
Created At | Subject | Priority| Group Name (Group Number)

workflow.name: SendWebMessage
workflow.description: Sends a message from a web browser

section.heading: Send Personal or Group Message
section.paragraph: Messages can be sent to a single device or to multiple devices. To send a message to a single device, select Send Personal Message. To send a message to a group of devices, select Send Group Message. To send a predefined 'quick message' to a group of devices, select Send Quick Message.

section.heading: Search All Devices
section.paragraph: To search for a recipient, enter all or part of the recipient's name. To search for a phone number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available devices, leave all fields blank. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Send Personal Message
section.paragraph: All users in your unit that are associated to an online device are listed below. Select the recipient from the list that you would like to message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different device or recipient, select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: To send a personal message to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}.#{Devices.usr.last_name}, select a message from the Favorites list below. To send a message using a predefined template from your unit, select a template from the Templates for My Unit list below. To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Favorites
Templates for My Unit
Template Categories
section.paragraph: Select a category from the list below to view the templates in that category. To create your own message instead, select A Custom Message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To go back to the list of templates, select Template List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Edit Personal Message
section.paragraph: Edit your message to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Devices.usr.last_name} or send as is. Use the edit field to edit your message or select the Send button below to send your message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a different message, select Template List from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add an additional recipient to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: Select a message from the list below to send to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Devices.usr.last_name}. To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different recipient, select Select Different Recipient from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Recipients Search Results
section.paragraph: All users that match your search criteria and have an online device are listed below. Select a recipient from the list that you would like to message or select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above to change your search parameters.

section.heading: Message Confirmation
section.paragraph:
Your message was sent from #{DM.from.usr.reference_name} to #{Devices.usr.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}.#{Devices.usr.last_name}. To send another message, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to your home page, select Home from the top right of the screen.
Sent Message Content: #{DM.message}

section.heading: Search All Groups
section.paragraph: To search for a group, enter all or part of the group's name. To search for a group number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available group, leave both fields blank. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Send Group Message
section.paragraph: Select a user group from the list below to message the group. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a group you would like to message, select Search All Groups from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: To send a group message to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number}), select a message from the lists below. To create your own message, select A Custom Message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Select Different Group from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Favorites
Templates for My Unit
Template Categories
section.paragraph: Select a category from the list below to view the templates in that category. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To go back to the list of templates, select Template List from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Edit Group Message
section.paragraph: Edit your message to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number}) or send as is. Use the edit field to edit your message or select the Send button below to send your message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a different message, select Template List from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Select Different Group from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Select Message
section.paragraph: Select a message from the list below to send to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number}). To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Select Different Group from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Group Search Results
section.paragraph: All groups that match your search criteria are listed below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a message to a different group, select Search All Groups from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Confirmation
section.paragraph:
Your message was sent from #{DM.from.usr.reference_name} to #{Groups.name} (#{Groups.number}). To send another message, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to your home page, select Home from the top right of the screen.
Sent Message Content: #{DM.message}

section.heading: Add Additional Recipients
section.paragraph: To add a new recipient to your message, select a recipient from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a recipient you would like to add to the message, select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Current Recipients
section.paragraph: Below is a list of the current recipients for your message. To remove a person from your current recipient list, select the recipient from the list below. Once you are satisfied with your current list of recipients, select the Send Message To Recipients button below.

section.heading: Search All Devices
section.paragraph: To search for a recipient to add to the message, enter all or part of the recipient's name. To search for a phone number, enter all or part of the number. To display all available devices, leave all fields blank. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To go back to the lists of recipients to add and current recipients, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Add Recipient
section.paragraph: To add the recipient to the list of recipients receiving your message, select the Add button below. To cancel adding the recipient, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Add #{Users.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Users.last_name} to the recipient list?
Remove Recipient
section.paragraph: To remove the recipient from the list of recipients receiving your message, select the Remove button below. To cancel removing the recipient, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Remove #{Users.first_name.as_substring(1,1)}. #{Users.last_name} from the recipient list?
Select Message
section.paragraph: To send a group message to (#{Groups.users.reference_name}), select a message from the Favorites list below. To send a message using a predefined template from your unit, select a template from the Templates for My Unit list below. To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message or remove current recipients from the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.
section.heading: Favorites
Templates for My Unit
Select Message
section.paragraph: Select a message from the list below to send that message to (#{Groups.users.reference_name}). To create your own message, select A Custom Message from the list below. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. If you do not see a template that you would like to use, select Template Categories from the navigation bar above. To add additional recipients to the message or remove recipients from the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Edit Message
section.paragraph: Edit your message to #{Groups.users.reference_name}, or send as is. Use the edit field to edit your message or select the Send button below to send your message. To return to the Send Message menu, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To send a different message, select Template List from the navigation bar above. To add an additional recipient to the message or remove a recipient from the message, select Add Additional Recipients from the navigation bar above.

section.heading: Confirmation
section.paragraph:
Your message was sent from #{DM.from.usr.reference_name} to (#{Groups.users.reference_name}). To send another message, select Send Message Menu from the navigation bar above. To return to your home page, select Home from the top right of the screen.

section.heading: Adhoc Recipients Search Results
section.paragraph: All users matching your search criteria that are associated to an online device are listed below. Select a recipient from the list below that you would like to add to the recipient list or select Search All Devices from the navigation bar above to change your search parameters.
